column5: So incredibly sorry you lost such an amazing person. It’s really sad. I really want to give you a hug right now, op. Stay strong. And keep him alive in your heart. *BIG HUG*
Being reminded of her through the objects that she left behind must’ve hurt. I’m so sorry for your loss op. Take care of yourself.
Hey there op. I'm so so sorry you're going thorough this tough time. I really am. I wish I could help. What you're going through is so terrible. I really hope you find solace soon. *hug*
